metadata.title: Matchbox
metadata.songInfo: by Ike Turner recording of 1997 from Lie To Me (A&M 540640) ,

xml.lyrics:
Yeah I'm tired of sighing, tired of worrying you too But I made up my mind baby, what I'm gonna do I got my clothes in a matchbox, I'm gonna forget about you
But I tried to tell you many times, but I never could do it You believe me baby, this time I'm through I got my clothes in a matchbox, I'm gonna forget about you
Now when things get harder, yeah, and rough on you Don't try to get me back now baby, 'cause baby I'm through I got my clothes in a matchbox, gonna forget about you
